Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionController
    Controller class that manages an Action
    GameController
    Main controller class that manages the match.
    Lobby
    The Lobby of a match, game starts and lobby is cleared upon countdown ending or maximum number of player reached
    Notifier
    This class is for notifying people that something has happened
    PaymentGateway
    Controller that manages all the payments in ammo
    PowerUpController
    Controller that handles the usage of the powerups
    RemotePlayer
    This class is a wrapper for the View class and adds functionalities to handle timeouts and disconnections based on ping
    ScoreController
    Controller that calculates the score and handles players' death
    ServerController
    Controller class that handles the server
    ShootController
    Controller that handles the shooting operations
    TurnController
    Controller that handles a single turn
    Updater
    Class that handles the model updates
